4013007887.description: Vengeance offers only lessons in suffering, but there is value in every lesson we learn.

4015926630.name: Gauntlets of No Tomorrow
4015926630.description: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

4015926631.name: Astrolord Gauntlets
4015926631.description: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

4016028184.name: KALI-GNT Scout Rig
4016028184.description: I am a KALI-GNT AGGRESSIVE HANDSHAKE. Pleased to meet you.

4016028185.name: Raku Vindicator
4016028185.description: Leather flash conceals an exquisite self-aligning coil pattern.

4021554004.name: Mark of the Six Fronts
4021554004.description: Four orders of Titans held six approaches in the first great battle around the Last City, and not one front broke.

4021554005.name: Mark of the Pilgrim Guard
4021554005.description: Legend holds that Titans stood in defense of the first pilgrims to gather below the Traveler.

4021554007.name: Mark of the Bulwarks
4021554007.description: "War upon stone and it grows weaker. War upon man and he grows stronger. Which shall your wall be built of?"

4029703096.name: Agema Type 2
4029703096.description: "Proactive mobility is a luxury. Reactive mobility is a necessity." - from a doctrinal dispute

4029703098.name: Agema Type 0
4029703098.description: "Proactive mobility is a luxury. Reactive mobility is a necessity." - from a doctrinal dispute

4029703099.name: Agema Type 1
4029703099.description: "Proactive mobility is a luxury. Reactive mobility is a necessity." - from a doctrinal dispute

4042984492.name: Firebreak Type 3
4042984492.description: Built for forward battle, the Firebreak patterns reward diligent maintenance.

4042984493.name: Firebreak Type 4
4042984493.description: Built for forward battle, the Firebreak patterns reward diligent maintenance.

4042984494.name: Firebreak
4042984494.description: Built for forward battle, the Firebreak patterns reward diligent maintenance.

4042984495.name: Firebreak Type 2
4042984495.description: Built for forward battle, the Firebreak patterns reward diligent maintenance.

4045656577.name: Born Spark
4045656577.description: Fabricated by your Ghost using nearby mass, this fieldweave handles life support and little else.

4062024497.name: Mark of the Risen
4062024497.description: A Titan's mark declares deeds and influences. Your Ghost scrounged this cloth together. It's a start.

4068236668.name: Code Fire
4068236668.description: Fieldweave armor guards the body with invisible layers of the Warlock's own Light.

4068236669.name: Code Fire I
4068236669.description: Fieldweave armor guards the body with invisible layers of the Warlock's own Light.

4068236670.name: Code Fire IV
4068236670.description: Fieldweave armor guards the body with invisible layers of the Warlock's own Light.

4074407152.name: Illyrian Type 0
4074407152.description: Titan doctrine grapples with the balance between fixed strength and fluid, positional advantage.

4074407153.name: Illyrian Type 1
4074407153.description: Titan doctrine grapples with the balance between fixed strength and fluid, positional advantage.

4074407154.name: Illyrian Type 2
4074407154.description: Titan doctrine grapples with the balance between fixed strength and fluid, positional advantage.

4077210168.name: Cloak of No Tomorrow
4077210168.description: Tomorrow will be as yesterday was. There will always be a battle to be won.

4077210169.name: Astrolord Cloak
4077210169.description: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

4079606240.name: Robe of the Hezen Lords
4079606240.description: "Slept in the armor last night. Woke to feel my heart stuttering to the pattern of an unknown signal."

4079606241.name: Cuirass of the Hezen Lords
4079606241.description: "Slept in the armor last night. Woke to feel my heart stuttering to the pattern of an unknown signal."

4086448332.name: Dynamo Cloak
4086448332.description: "Your missions: protect the City. Look better than Warlocks. But don't look like you're trying." - Pahanin Errata

4086448334.name: Night Rain Cloak
4086448334.description: Hunters constantly tweak and upgrade their armor. A cloak is the best mark of recognition.

4086448335.name: Rustworn Cloak
4086448335.description: It's been stained and torn by old metal. But whatever it went through,  it survived.

4089012876.name: Mask of Immanent War
4089012876.description: Every horizon hides a war as old as time.

4098195080.name: Monolith Bleed III
4098195080.description: The Crucible gave birth to the thanatonauts: Warlocks who hunt for secrets in death.

4098195081.name: Symmetry Fang II
4098195081.description: The better part of everything is emptiness, and emptiness leaves room to move.

4100063449.name: Cloak of the Sixth Reign
4100063449.description: One throne beneath the howling dark.

4106244623.name: Elector's Robe
4106244623.description: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

4114288667.name: Mantle of Gheleon
4114288667.description: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

4141399030.name: Symmetry Fang VI
4141399030.description: There are six factors in true Csikszentmihalyian flow. First is the loss of self.

4141399031.name: Monolith Bleed IV
4141399031.description: Listen for the protests of weak minds breaking - crying out that their defeat was an error, a mistake.

4146057409.name: Don't Touch Me
4146057409.description: Amputated from a creature that stumbled out of a Vex gate. A vestigial defensive reflex still remains.

4151831794.name: Sanction Custom
4151831794.description: Nerve telemetry goes to a GNT study group working to understand the neural correlates of triumph.

4159298074.name: Oblivion Greaves
4159298074.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

4159298075.name: Exodus Greaves
4159298075.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

4171787962.name: Mark of the Exile
4171787962.description: "Though the City won a great battle at Twilight Gap, it lost an even greater mind." —Sister Lupe

4186410520.name: "Expansion"
4186410520.description: Always consider the connection between your field work and vaster things.

4186410521.name: "Light Unknown"
4186410521.description: The bond is signified and signifier, source and focus. Do not seek closure. Let the mystery unfold you.

4186410522.name: "Variable Flow"
4186410522.description: "Your power flows through the bond. Remember what it represents."

4187038137.name: "Creation's Wind"
4187038137.description: "The Light releases us from causality. It smooths the contours of what we can and cannot do."

4187038138.name: "Phantom Wisdom"
4187038138.description: "What is Light? Who made it? How does it work? Light itself answers these questions. Do you understand?"

4187038139.name: "Trained Chaos"
4187038139.description: "Control space and time. Mere matter and energy will follow."

4187254944.name: AOS#Al-Suhail II
4187254944.description: Crucible variant. Glove discharge nodes have no pain inhibitors.

4187254945.name: AOS#Al-Suhail I

4197359024.name: Manifold Seeker I

4197359025.name: Manifold Seeker II
4197359025.description: Keep the left shoulder into the weather, especially if the weather includes bullets.

4203554249.name: Mark of the Duskborn
4203554249.description: "We called her Verok; it was her and her Thrall that finally overwhelmed him." - Eris

4203554250.name: Mark of the Hidden
4203554250.description: "And with the lone strength of the Titan Vell Tarlowe, we felt invincible." - Eris

4203554251.name: Mark of the Spawn
4203554251.description: "It's not an Acolyte's loin cloth, it's the spoils of war." - Vell Tarlowe

4204366032.name: Locus Watcher I
4204366032.description: As the magnitude of the threat increases, so does the need for coordinated action.

4204366033.name: Locus Watcher II

4205889715.name: Prototype 0.9b
4205889715.description: Your Ghost built this wire armor from available mass. It handles life support, but little else.

4228432442.name: Order's Gloves
4228432442.description: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

4228432443.name: Justicar's Gloves
4228432443.description: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

4244487160.name: Elector's Grip
4244487160.description: True power comes from the hands of the people.

4249590861.name: Cloak of Repair
4249590861.description: We'll carve our future through the will of the people.

4270124520.name: "The Risen Ones"
4270124520.description: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

4270124521.name: "The Order"
4270124521.description: "A fractured will is the hallmark of disorder…"

4270124522.name: "The Age to Come"
4270124522.description: "There is strength in unity. And a King of many, will be the King of all."

4279147592.name: Agema Type 0
4279147592.description: A derivative of the Gatewatch pattern, Agema armor incorporates the lessons of too many bloody stands.

4279147593.name: Agema  Type 1
4279147593.description: A derivative of the Gatewatch pattern, Agema armor incorporates the lessons of too many bloody stands.

4279284444.name: Argus Deimatic 1.3
4279284444.description: Patterned by a grizzled Hunter and a Praxic Warlock, this remarkable armor records everything for later analysis.

4279284445.name: Argus Deimatic 1.3r1
4279284445.description: Patterned by a grizzled Hunter and a Praxic Warlock, this remarkable armor records everything for later analysis.

4292535404.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

4292535405.description: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

4294567508.name: Dead Light Helm
4294567508.description: "Listen. Some stars won't stop calling to us." —Arach Linde
